summary: A law school professor witnesses his colleague, friend and mentor murder his own wife. Rather than turn his friend in, he disowns him, but the decision leads to more danger.
cast: Miguel de Lira|Emilio Gutiérrez Caba|Alberto Jiménez|Noelia Noto|Nathalie Poza|Jorge Ricoy|Tristán Ulloa
title: Un buen hombre
